custom-action.name: imported_Press GuiMainWindow (Display the system log)
custom-action.description:
This action simulates a key press action on an SAP object.
Possible parameters are: - objectId (optional): The SAP GUI object identifier. Default value is "ses[0]/wnd[0]". - key (required): The keyboard key. A String constant as "Enter", "F2" or an integer as "0" or "2". Default value is "Enter". - ignoreErrors (optional): If set to "true", the action won't be in error if object is not found, type is not supported or an exception is thrown. Default value is "false". - windowId (optional): The SAP GUI window identifier. - objectName (optional): The SAP GUI object name. - objectType (optional): The SAP GUI object type.
